meanings.definition: Not resting or ceasing from activity.
meanings.sent1: The squirrel was unresting, always running around the park.
meanings.sent2: The restless child was always moving, never sitting still.
meanings.sent3: The alarm clock seemed to be unresting, ringing every few minutes.
meanings.sent4: Her mind was an unresting river, flowing with thoughts and ideas.
meanings.sent5: The wind was unresting, constantly rustling the leaves in the trees.

meanings.sent1: The bustling city was unresting, with people always on the move.
meanings.sent2: The ants were unresting, tirelessly working to build their nest.
meanings.sent3: The old car was unresting, sputtering and coughing as it tried to start.
meanings.sent4: His thoughts were like an unresting storm, swirling and never settling.
meanings.sent5: The river was unresting, flowing swiftly downstream without pause.
